TopicTitle: larger UI Fonts for an old Kerbonaut?

Articles.Content: I'm old and my eyes are not great so...is there any way to enlarge the fonts on the basic user interface screen?  Thanks.

@GungaDin In the game settings (available off the first screen you see) there is a UI Scale setting that changes the base scale of the user interface. Mods on the other hand often lack scaling support.at all or handle uniquely in each mod.

Once you are in flight in a saved game hit the escape key, select settings, and scroll down a bit. There are scaling options to individually set scaling of different aspects of the user interface. 

All of these settings are also available in the settings.cfg file in the game's install directory. All begin UI_SCALE with a number where 1 = 100%. My understanding is that the values here can exceed the range normally allowed with the sliders in game.
